title: U.S. - average salary for graduates , by discipline 2020
summary: This is a bar chart representing Discipline in the x axis and Average salary in U.S. dollars in the y axis.
The Average salary in U.S. dollars is highest at Discipline Computer Science and lowest at Discipline Business.
The highest Discipline Computer Science has 4596.0 more Average salary in U.S. dollars than the lowest Discipline Business.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Average salary in U.S. dollars for 4 number of Disciplines.
